edu.cmu.ri.rcommerce.sensor
Class RSSIDistanceMetric

java.lang.Object
  edu.cmu.ri.rcommerce.sensor.RSSIDistanceMetric

public class RSSIDistanceMetric
extends Object

Compares RSSI measurements for similarity Properties of the metric are that any measurements with beacons in common will be closer than completely disjoint measurements The number of beacons in common is the primary measure of similarity, with correspondence in values as a secondary factor
